text: Saiyaku ni atta nochi ware no jihi ni yoku sa seru to, kare wa kanarazu,`kore wa watashi (no chikara) ni wa tōzen no kotodesu. (Shinpan no) toki ga, kuru to wa kangae raremasen. Mata omoni kisa rete mo, watashi wa kare no omoto de, hōbi o moraimasu.' To iu. Daga ware wa korera fushinjin no mono ni taishi, sono okonatta koto o 示 Shi, kanarazu tearai chōbatsu o aji wa seru
